docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Admonition
docs.text:
Example of an admonition/callout with a title:

!!! note "Title of the callout"

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla et euismod
nulla. Curabitur feugiat, tortor non consequat finibus, justo purus auctor
massa, nec semper lorem quam in massa.

Collapsible callout:

Collapsible callout

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla et euismod nulla. Curabitur feugiat, tortor non consequat finibus, justo purus auctor massa, nec semper lorem quam in massa.

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
print() function
print("Hello world")
print("Hello world")
print("Hello world")
print("Hello world")
print("Hello world")
print("Hello world")
print("Hello world")
print("Hello world")

docs.title: Generic Content
docs.text:
Plain textUnordered listOrdered list

This is some plain text

  • First item
  • Second item
  • Third item
  1. First item
  2. Second item
  3. Third editor

docs.title: Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagrams
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request
  loop Health
      Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
  end
  Note right of Terminal: System online
  Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data
